changelog: Updated Settings page to support the full SVG flag system (200+ flags) with optimized loading and search
Reworked driver flag management to use SVG assets instead of emoji for consistent cross-platform rendering
Improved Header logic to correctly display the user's driver flag with automatic fallback and Linux-safe lowercase handling
Refactored settings retrieval and token-related logic for better stability and cleaner state management
Extracted flag modal, number modal, and driver card into standalone reusable components
Fixed multiple 404 issues related to asset paths by standardizing the flags folder under /public/flags
General UI polishing and small accessibility improvements across Settings & Header
